title: Drawing, Elevation and Plan of Music Cabinet with Inlay, 1900–05
title_raw: Elevation and Plan of Music Cabinet with Inlay
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, center of elevation: inlay [twice]; at lower left of elevation: Brass; along lower edge of elevation, numerical notations; below elevation, center: Music cabinet; below plan, center: Plan; inside, lower center, and right of plan, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Elevation (upper half of sheet): rectangular 2-door panel at front with inlaid laurel wreath  center; raised on straight slightly tapering feet.  Plan (below center): rectangular top of cabinet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Elevation and Plan of Music Cabinet with Inlay, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-218.
